SARAH CHEN
Senior Software Engineer
sarah.chen@email.com | San Francisco, CA | linkedin.com/in/sarahchen

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in React.js and Node.js with extensive AWS cloud infrastructure experience. Led teams at Google and multiple high-growth startups.

SKILLS
Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Go
Frontend: React.js, Next.js, Redux, GraphQL, Tailwind CSS
Backend: Node.js, Express, NestJS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
Infrastructure: AWS (ECS, Lambda, DynamoDB), Kubernetes (k8s), Docker, Terraform
Tools: Git, CI/CD, Datadog, Sentry

EXPERIENCE

Senior Software Engineer
Google, Mountain View, CA
July 2021 - Present
- Led development of internal developer platform serving 2,000+ engineers
- Architected microservices using Go and Kubernetes, reducing deployment time by 60%
- Mentored team of 5 junior engineers, conducting code reviews and technical design sessions
- Implemented real-time collaboration features using WebSockets and Redis pub/sub

Stripe, San Francisco, CA
March 2019 - June 2021
- Built payment processing dashboard handling $50M+ daily transaction volume
- Developed React components with TypeScript, achieving 95% test coverage
- Optimized PostgreSQL queries reducing p99 latency by 40%
- Collaborated with product team to ship 3 major features per quarter

June 2017 - February 2019
- Developed booking flow improvements increasing conversion rate by 15%
- Built A/B testing infrastructure using Python and Apache Kafka
- Migrated legacy jQuery codebase to React, improving maintainability
- Participated in on-call rotation supporting production systems
